fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Link your soul to another player at night. Everything that happens to them on that night will happen to you, and you will receive all night messages they receive. During the next day, every day ability used on them will also be used on you. You will also receive all whispers directed to them, and all whispers they send. If they're lynched, you will be lynched as well.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - The player you target will not be notified.
